subject: feat(views): implement timeline view with property-based time axis
body:
Vertical timeline visualization that orders nodes by a selected date
property (or creation date as default). Groups entries by month,
shows labels, supports selection for detail panel integration.
Excluded items (missing the date property) shown in a collapsible
section. Responsive for mobile with iOS auto-zoom prevention.

Tags: phase-6, timeline, views, ui
Complexity: 3
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: product-realignment
Semver: minor
